scripts.build: npm run clean && babel src/ -d out/ --source-maps
scripts.buildTests: npm run clean && babel test/ -d out/test --source-maps && babel src/ -d out/src --source-maps
scripts.test: istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -u exports --compilers js:babel-core/register -R spec -r test/setup.js test/*{,*/}*.js
scripts.watch: nodemon --ignore out/ --ignore node_modules/ --exec 'npm run eslint && npm run test && npm run build'
